tasks.label: Build Portable Pong
tasks.command: mkdir -p Pong.app/Contents/{MacOS,Resources,Frameworks} && clang++ -o Pong.app/Contents/MacOS/Pong main.cpp -I/opt/homebrew/opt/raylib/include -LPong.app/Contents/Frameworks -lraylib -std=c++17 -framework OpenGL -framework Cocoa -framework IOKit -Wl,-rpath,@executable_path/../Frameworks && cp -r /opt/homebrew/opt/raylib/lib/libraylib.*.dylib Pong.app/Contents/Frameworks/ && install_name_tool -change /opt/homebrew/opt/raylib/lib/libraylib.dylib @rpath/libraylib.dylib Pong.app/Contents/MacOS/Pong
